titles.title: Build My Life
Worthy of every song
Holy, there is noone like you

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 c v1 v2 c b c

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Worthy of every song we could ever sing
Worthy of all the praise we could ever bring
Worthy of every breath we could ever breathe
We live for you

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Jesus the name above every other name
Jesus the only one who could save
Worthy of every breath we could ever breathe
We live for you
Oh we live for you

verse.name: c
verse.lines:
Holy there is no one like you
There is none beside you
Open up my eyes in wonder
Show me who you are and fill me
With your heart and lead me
In your love to those around me

verse.name: b
verse.lines:
And I will build my life upon your love it is a firm foundation
And I will put my trust in you alone
And I will not be shaken
